type_library.coerce_subset_or_iv

type_library.coerce_subset_or_iv(o: SetOrIVInput, s: SetInput) → SetOrIV[source]

Coerce an arbitrarily typed object o into either a properly typed subset or proper incidence vector of a set S.

This function infers the correct type by inspecting the object o.

Parameters

  • o – An arbitrarily typed object.

  • s – The set S.

Returns

A properly typed subset or incidence vector of S.
